feed.title: 黑客新闻摘要; ;https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml; ;2023-07-21T09:54:19.759591Z; ; ; ; ;polyrabbit; ;https://github.com/polyrabbit/; ; ;Werkzeug; ; ;LHC内部三重态磁铁的淬灭导致小泄漏，造成严重后果</stitle>; <id>;https://home.cern/news/news/accelerators/accelerator-report-quench-lhc-inner-trip let-magnet-causes-small-leak-major</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T07:52:42.317102Z</updated>; <link href="https://home.cern/news/news/accelerators/accelerator-report-quench-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-small-leak-major"/>; <作者>; <名称>;未倾斜</名称>; < uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=untilted</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cds.cern.ch/images/CERN-HOMEWEB-PHO-2023-098-1/file?size=large" style="width: 220px;高度：165px;" />;<br />;由于电扰动，大型强子对撞机光束在碰撞仅 9 分钟后就被倾倒。包括内部三重态磁体在内的几个超导磁体被淬灭，低温电路和绝缘真空之间出现了小泄漏。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#quench-of-lhc-inner-triplet-magnet-causes-a-small-leak-with-major-cons equences" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811018" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Fly.io Postgres 集群停机 3 天，他们没有任何消息</stitle >; <id>;https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:2T9NpG8thZgJ:https://community.fly.io/t/service-interruption-cant-destroy-machine-deploy-or-restart/14227&cd=9&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=au</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T23:52:42.42 8457Z</更新>; <link href="https://webcache.googleusercontent.com/search?q=cache:2T9NpG8thZgJ:https://community.fly.io/t/service-interruption-cant-destroy-machine-deploy-or-restart/14227&cd=9&hl=en&ct=clnk&gl=au"/>; <作者>; <名称>;burnerbob </名称>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=burnerbob</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://global.discourse-cdn.com/business7/uploads/fly1/original/2X/6/6c0156ccc5696c58a720d8d900de3fd31ca2f109.png" style="width: 220px; height: 109px;" />;<br />;Fly.io Postgres 集群已关闭 3 天，公司没有任何通信。用户无法重新启动或销毁已停止的机器实例，并且他们的应用程序和数据库遇到问题。人们对 Fly.io 缺乏信息和更新感到沮丧和担忧。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fly-io-postgres-cluster-down-for-3-days-no-word-from-them-about -it" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808296" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;能够看到专业知识是值得追求的里程碑</stitle>; <id >;https://commoncog.com/seeing-expertise-milestone-worth-aiming-for/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T07:52:42.430335Z</updated>; <link href="https://commoncog.com/seeing-expertise-milestone-worth-aiming-for/"/>; <作者>; <name>;nickwritesit </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=nickwritesit</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://commoncog.com/content/images/2022/04/kl_judo_sankaku_class.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;专家比新手能看到更多的专业知识梯度，这使得新手很难理解为什么专家擅长他们所做的事情。这种缺乏理解也导致不同技能水平的自由职业者收取的费率存在差异。客户大多是新手，无法区分技能树高端的从业者，而专家可以。这意味着在达到一定的技能水平后，通过经验取得的任何改进都是看不见的<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ability-to-see-expertise-is-a-milestone-worth-aiming-for" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36784864" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hacker news.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;21世纪论文中的17世纪字体</stitle>; <id>;https://www.linyangchen.com/Typography-Fell-Types-font</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T21:52:42.431400Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.linyangchen.com/Typography- Fell-Types-font"/>; <作者>; <名称>;_emacsomancer_</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=_emacsomancer_</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://photos.smugmug.com/photos/i-G9xQbXV/0/X3/i-G9xQbXV-X3.jpg" style="width: 220 像素； height: 266px;" />;<br />;作者在博士论文中讨论了他们对数字字体的不满以及对模拟凸版印刷的方法的探索。他们发现了 Fell 字体，这是 Caslon 所源自的原始字体的数字化版本，并在论文中使用了它。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-17th- century-font-in-a-21st- century-论文" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36807108" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Oxide 计算机：文档</stitle>; <id>;https://docs.oxy.computer/guide s/introduction</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T20:52:42.432258Z</updated>; <link href="https://docs.oxy.computer/guides/introduction"/>; <author>; <name>;avrong</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=avrong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Oxide Computer 是一个高效的机架级计算系统，硬件和软件。在开发人员生产力方面，它具有与云超大规模基础设施相同的许多优势，但长期基础设施成本却低得多。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#oxy-computer-docs" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36806539" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;法学硕士星座</stitle>; <id>;https://llmconstellation.olafblitz.repl.co/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T05:52:42.432982Z</updated>; <link href="https://llmconstellation.olafblitz.repl.co/"/>; <作者>; <name>;fzliu</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=f zliu</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#llm-constellation" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810230" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.beta cat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;纳秒时间戳冲突很常见</stitle>; <id>;https://www.evanjones.ca/nanosecond-collisions.html</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T07:52:42.433663Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.evanjones.ca/nanosecond-collisions.html"/>; <author>; <name>;ingve </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ingve</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;我编写了一个小测试程序，用于比较 Go 中“绝对”时间和“单调时钟”记录的连续时间戳和绝对时间戳之间的相对差异。该行为取决于系统，在 Mac OS X 和 Linux 上观察到不同的结果。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nanosecond-timestamp-collisions-are-common" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810818" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/ feed.xml">; <title type="text">;询问 HN：Stripe 有哪些低成本支付处理替代方案？</stitle>; <id>;https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811026</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T07:52:42.434340Z</updated>; <link href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=3681 1026"/>; <author>; <name>;NavyG</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=NavyG</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;与赞助银行和 Braintree 合作的 ISO 是 Stripe 的低成本支付处理替代方案。 Adyen 是另一个覆盖范围广泛的低成本选择。 Hyperswitch 是一个支持多个处理器的开源支付协调器。有许多可用的支付处理器，但它们在功能和定价方面本质上是相同的。选择取决于网关设计、支持响应能力和计费方法等因素。在美国以外，还有其他不使用信用卡网络的转账方式。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ask-hn-what-are-some-low-cost- payment-processing-alternatives-to-stripe" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36811026" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;研究发现微波加热容器时释放出数十亿纳米塑料</stitle>; <id>;https://news.unl.edu/newsrooms/today/article/nebraska-study-finds-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T03:52:4 2.435015Z</更新>; <link href="https://news.unl.edu/newsrooms/today/article/nebraska-study-finds-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving/"/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<im g src="https://news.unl.edu/sites/default/files/styles/large_aspect/public/media/Hero_323.jpg?itok=VrSN38Hg" style="宽度：220px；高度：124px；" />;<br />;微波塑料婴儿食品容器会释放大量塑料颗粒，包括每平方厘米容器数十亿个纳米塑料和数百万个微塑料。食用这些颗粒对健康的影响尚不清楚，但实验表明它们可能对肾细胞有毒。了解食物中塑料颗粒的数量并限制接触它们非常重要。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#study-finds-billions-of-nano Plastics-released-when-microwaving-containers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809565" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <条目 xml： base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;子像素距离变换</stitle>; <id>;https://acko.net/blog/subpixel-distance-transform/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T02:52:42.435696Z</updated>; <link href="https://acko.net/blog/subpixel-distance-transform/"/>; <author>; <name>; signa11</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=signa11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://acko.net/files/esdt/cover.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 124px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了有符号距离场 (SDF) 在文本渲染中的使用。它解释了生成 SDF 的过程以及实现亚像素精度所面临的挑战。作者还描述了他们的 Use.GPU 项目中使用的一种新颖的亚像素精确距离变换 (ESDT)。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#sub-pixel-distance-transform" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36809404" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;抛开好莱坞电影不谈，奥本海默到底是一位多么优秀的物理学家？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.science.org/content/article/movie-adds-oppenheimer-s-celebrity-just-how-good-physicalist-was-he</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T23:52:42.436369Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.science.org/ content/article/movie-adds-oppenheimer-s-celebrity-just-how-good-physicalist-was-he"/>; <author>; <name>;andrewl</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=andrewl</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hollywood-movie-aside-just-how-good-a-physicist -was-oppenheimer" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808001" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;邀请秘密社团</stitle>; <id>;https://www. Experimental-history.com/p/an-invitation-to-a-secret-society</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T22:52:42.437025Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.experimental-history.com/p/an-invitation-to-a-secret-society"/>; <author>; <name>;surprisetalk</name>; <uri>;https ://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=surprisetalk</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://substackcdn.com/image/fetch/w_120,c_limit,f_auto,q_auto:good,fl_progressive:steep/https%3A%2F%2Fsubstack-post-media.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fpublic%2Fimages%2F548f 103c-9c2a-4e20-aa3f-c0cec659b902_1194x1523.jpeg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 281px;" />;<br />;我邀请每一位好奇的人去做科学并在互联网上分享。科学研究​​需要更多元的声音和想法。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-invitation-to-a-secret-society" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36807763" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;FedNow 上线</stitle>; <id>;https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other20230720a.htm</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T15:52： 42.437669Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.federalreserve.gov/newsevents/pressreleases/other20230720a.htm"/>; <author>; <name>;lavp</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=lavp</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.federalreserve.gov/images/social -media/social-default-image-opengraph.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 116px;" />;<br />;美联储宣布其新的即时支付系统 FedNow 服务现已上线。该工具允许银行和信用社为客户即时转账，使日常支付更快、更方便。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#fednow-is-live" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 36801491" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Hipgnosis，改变唱片套的设计师</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/film/2023/jul/03/anton-corbijn-hipgnosis-film-pink-floyd -led-zeppelin</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T01:52:42.438338Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/film/2023/jul/03/anton-corbijn-hipgnosis-film-pink-floyd-led-zeppelin"/>; <作者>; <名称>;8bitsrule</名称>; <uri>;https://news.y combinator.com/user?id=8bitsrule</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/43bf707f76869042b60eb12f6a5f68427c96a378/1110_156_2557_2557/master/2557.jpg?width=120 &dpr=1&s=无" style="宽度：220px;高度：220px;" />;<br />;以其摄影和音乐视频而闻名的安东·科尔宾 (Anton Corbijn) 执导了一部关于专辑封面设计先驱 Hipgnosis 唱片封套的纪录片。该纪录片采访了 Pink Floyd、Led Zeppelin 和 Paul McCartney 等乐队和艺术家，展示了 Hipgnosis 的创意和创意组合。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hipgnosis-the-designers -who-changed-the-record-sleeve" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36797324" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Lit：简单、快速的 Web 组件</stitle>; <id>;https://lit.dev/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T21:52:42.439009Z</更新>; <link href="https://lit.dev/"/>; <作者>; <name>;tambourine_man</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tambourine_man</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://lit.dev/图片/logo-whitebg-padded-1600x800.png" style="width: 220px; height: 111px;" />;<br />;Lit 组件是可在手写 HTML 或框架代码中使用的标准自定义元素。它们非常高效，并且每当反应性属性发生更改时都会重新渲染。Lit 可以轻松构建适合每个团队的 Web 组件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#lit-simple-fast-web-components" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator. com/item?id=36806747" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;安藤百福发明了方便面 (2016)</stitle>; <id>;https://www.vox.com/2015/3/5/8150929/momofuku- ando-ramen-instant-noodles</id>; <更新>;2023-07-21T00:52:42.439675Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.vox.com/2015/3/5/8150929/momofuku-ando-ramen-instant-noodles"/>; <作者>; <name>;thunderbong</name>; <uri>;https://news.y Combinator.com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.vox-cdn.com/thumbor/VrFvA9FXiEkez-eXQm17xdMoxpg=/0x0:2832x2121/1200x0/filters:focal(0x0:2832x2121):no_upscale( )/cdn.vox-cdn.com/uploads/chorus_asset/file/3470748/51791749.0.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 165px;" />;<br />;方便面的发明者安藤百福已成为各地美食家的英雄。方便面被评为日本 20 世纪顶级发明。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#momofuku-ando-invented-instant-ramen-2016" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https:// news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36782487" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我们如何制作 MuseScore 4 [视频]</stitle>; <id>;https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qct6LKbneKQ</id>; <已更新>;2023-07-21T02:52:42.440977Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Qct6LKbneKQ"/>; <author>; <name>;maybevain</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=maybevain</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<iframe src="//www.youtube. com/embed/Qct6LKbneKQ"frameborder="0"allowfullscreen loading="lazy">;</iframe>; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#how-we-made-musescore-4-video" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36804692" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;理查德·罗兹写了一本关于奥本海默和原子弹的经典书籍</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/archive/2023/07/richard-rhodes-making-of-the-atomic-bomb-ai/674777/</id>; <updated>; 2023-07-20T21：52：42.441792Z </更新>; <link href =“https://www.theatlantic.com/technology/archive/2023/07/richard-rhodes-making-of-the-atomic-bomb-ai/674777/”/>; <作者>; <name>;胡克</ name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=Hooke</uri >; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.theatlantic.com/thumbor/1tVnLk7bxG-lNG_8oCyX236pyy0=/0x117:1000x1367/648x810/media/img/2023/07/20/_IAN8067_1/original.jpg" style="width: 2 20 像素；高度：275px;" />;<br />;《原子弹的制造》一书的作者理查德·罗德斯反思了核武器的发展与当前构建人工智能的竞赛之间的相似之处。他讨论了围绕人工智能的道德担忧，以及对人工智能可能变得比人类更聪明并变得流氓的担忧。罗德斯强调了互补性的概念，即武器可以同时成为和平的工具，并警告说，如果不小心控制，人工智能系统可能会违背其预期目的。<a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#richard-rhodes-wrote-a-classic-book-about-oppenheimer-and-the-atomic-bomb" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36806922" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我美丽的朋友</stitle>; <id>;https://thepointmag.com/examined-life/my-beautiful-friend/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T23:52:42.443283Z</updated>; <link href="https://thepointmag.com/examined-life/my-beautiful-friend/"/>; <作者>; <name>;jger15</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=jger15</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://thepointmag.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/Christie_PrudenceFlint_web4.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;作者反思了她意识到自己永远不可能成为大美人以及这对她自尊的影响。她探讨了她与一位美丽朋友的友谊动态以及她对她的嫉妒和怨恨。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-beautiful-friend" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=36807071" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;硬件黑客 (2004) [pdf]</stitle>; <id>;http://www.nicolascollins.com/texts/originalhackingmanual.pdf</id>; <更新>;2023- 07-21T00:52:42.443957Z</updated>; <link href="http://www.nicolascollins.com/texts/originalhackingmanual.pdf"/>; <author>; <name>;ynac</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ynac</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;本文是硬件黑客指南，涵盖电路嗅探、焊接、并创建自制电路。它强调了在探索电子设备时无所畏惧和充满信心的重要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hardware-hacking-2004-pdf" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808679" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;No-more-secrets：重现 1992 年电影《运动鞋》中的解密效果</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/bartobri/no-more-secrets</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T13:52:42.444658Z</updated>; <link href="https://github.com/bartobri/no-more-secrets"/>; <author>; <name>; tambourine_man</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=tambourine_man</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://camo.githubusercontent.com/68bbd6c555003c61a5e865edaf317f370a7b35544abb59a85ce179fde58f626f/68 747470733a2f2f7777772e627269616e626172746f2e696e666f2f7374617469632f6e6d732f6e6d732e676966“样式=“宽度：220像素；高度：125像素；” />;<br />;该项目提供了一个名为 nms 的命令行工具，可以重现 1992 年黑客电影《Sneakers》中著名的数据解密效果。它适用于管道数据，显示加密数据，然后显示原始纯文本字符。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#no-more-secrets-recreate-the-decryption-effect-seen-in-the-1992-movie-sneakers" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36799776" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry >; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;亚马逊关闭客户的智能家居</stitle>; <id>;https://forums.macrumors.com/threads/amazon-shuts-down-customers-smart-home.2392704/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T04:52:42.445315Z</update d>; <link href="https://forums.macrumors.com/threads/amazon-shuts-down-customers-smart-home.2392704/"/>; <作者>; <name>;KnuthIsGod</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=KnuthIsGod</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://forums.macrumors.com/proxy。 php?image=https%3A%2F%2Fmiro.medium.com%2Fv2%2Fresize%3Afit%3A1024%2F1%2AKge-FipnWpJqcOrFXEE6NA.png&hash=c6c4e9dd97be29e66377e3f01159c0dc&return_error=1" style="宽度：220px；高度：220像素；” />;<br />;一位亚马逊客户的亚马逊账户被锁定了一周，导致他的智能家居设备变得无响应。此次封锁是由一名亚马逊司机的虚假报告引发的，该司机声称收到了顾客门铃发出的种族主义言论。该事件引发了人们对亚马逊处理此类情况的担忧，并凸显了改善客户服务和解决冲突的必要性。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#amazon-shuts-down-customers-smart-home" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36810075" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed .xml">; <title type="text">;FTC 警告棋盘游戏内容创作者、发行商披露关系</stitle>; <id>;https://boardgamewire.com/index.php/2023/07/17/ftc-warns-board-game-influencers-publishers-over-failing-to-properly-disclose-relationships-free-gifts/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-21T00:52:42 .446701Z</updated>; <link href="https://boardgamewire.com/index.php/2023/07/17/ftc-warns-board-game-influencers-publishers-over-failing-to-properly-disclose-relationships-free-gifts/"/>; <author>; <name>;webmaven</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=webmaven</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;棋盘游戏评论者和影响者未能正确披露他们何时收到免费游戏，这使他们自己和发行商面临法院诉讼的风险。美国联邦贸易委员会更新了其指南，将在线影响者纳入其中，并指出每个媒体的信息披露应简单且突出。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#ftc-warns-board-game-content-creators-publishers-to-disclose-relationships" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36808430" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;TypeChat</stitle>; <id>;https://microsoft.github.io/TypeChat/blog/introducing-typechat/</id>; <更新>;2023-07-20T16:52:42.447449Z</updated>; <link href="https://microsoft.github.io/TypeChat/blog/introducing-typechat/"/>; <作者>; < name>;DanRosenwasser</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=DanRosenwasser</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;TypeChat 是 Microsoft 发布的一个实验性库，旨在将大型语言模型集成到现有应用程序界面中。它使用代码库中的类型定义来检索类型安全的结构化 AI 响应。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#typechat" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36803124" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;好的代码就像给下一个维护它的开发人员的情书</stitle>; <id>;https://addyosmani.com/blog/good-code/</id>; <updated>;2023-07-20T21:52:42.448154Z</updated>; <link href="https://addyosmani.com/blog/good-code/"/>; <author>; <name>;feross</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= feross</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://res.cloudinary.com/ddxwdqwkr/image/upload/w_1600,h_836,q_100/l_text:Karla_72_bold:Good%20code%20is%20like%20a%20love%20letter%20to%20the%20next%20develop er%20who%20will%20maintain%20it.,co_rgb:ffe4e6,c_fit,w_1400,h_240/fl_layer_apply,g_south_west,x_100,y_180/l_text:Karla_48:addyosmani.com%2520%25C2%25B7%2520工程,co_rgb: ffe4e680,c_fit,w_1400/fl_layer_apply,g_south_west,x_100,y_100/l_twitter_name:addyosmani/c_thumb,g_face,r_max,w_380,h_380,q_100/fl_layer_apply,w_140,g_north_west,x_100,y_100/v1 681336739/addy/grain-gradient.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 115px;" />;<br />;代码的本质是沟通。好的代码就像一封写给下一个维护它的开发人员的情书。它是个性化的、真诚的、体贴的、精心设计的，以最高效率解决问题。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#good-code-is-like-a-love-letter-to-the-next-developer-who-will-maintain-it" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36807028" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Python Cheatsheet</stitle>; <id>;https://gto76.github.io/python-cheatsheet/</id>; <已更新>;2023-07-20T21:52:42.448839Z</updated>; <link href="https://gto76.github.io/python-cheatsheet/"/>; <author>; <name>;zombiemama</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=zombiemama</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gto76.github.io /python-cheatsheet/web/image_social_3.png" style="width: 220px; height: 114px;" />;<br />;模块运算符提供了 itemgetter() 和 mul() 函数，它们提供与上面 lambda 表达式相同的功能。这意味着它可以用作字典中的键或集合中的元素。每个抽象基类指定一组虚拟子类。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#python-cheatsheet" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.y Combinator.com/item?id=36806753" target="_blank">;[comments]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Shelter 协议：端到端加密、联合、用户友好的 Web 应用</stitle>; <id>;https://shelterprotocol.net</id>; <更新>;2023-07 -20T18:52:42.449504Z</updated>; <link href="https://shelterprotocol.net"/>; <author>; <name>;gslepak</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=gslepak</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#shelter-protocol-end-to-end-encrypted- federated-user-Friendly-web-apps" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=36804404" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
